name: HeckenBeck
description:
"See how far you can get. By jumping over the randomized platforms, try to avoid going to heck...but don't worry - you'll come beck!"

Hi all, I put this game up a couple of weeks ago and was not happy with the bugs and overall look, etc. I cleaned it up and fixed some core issues and now it is a decent quick game. I learned how to incorporate a leaderboard which was the biggest break-though for me. Try and get the high score!
